short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create today's task by entering just a few details

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The sciera extension aims to provide users with a seamless and user-friendly way to generate tasks for the day. This extension is designed for simplicity, allowing users to create tasks with minimal effort and streamline their daily planning.
